summary: An Ordinance transferring $2,191.44 from The General Fund to the Special Funds of Local Improvement Districts Nos. 151, 169, 172, 178, 179, 149, 311, 321, 331 and 358 for the purpose of refunding the excess portions of assessment paid by property owners for the various improvements of said Local Improvement Districts, and authorizing and directing the drawing and payments of warrants therefor.
